English: Comrades, listen up. We attack Morton from the west. We're team Anton, team Boris supports us from the east.\nThere is no armour reported in the village, but be careful nonetheless.
Keep close behind me and stay in formation! Focus, remember your training!\nTake cover whenever possible. Use the buildings, stay off open ground. Fire when you have a clear shot.
We're almost there. Good luck, comrades!
WITH ME, COMRADES. KEEP FORMATION. WE CONTINUE TO THE VILLAGE.
BAZA TO ANTON. MISSION COMPLETED. FORTIFY YOUR POSITIONS WITH BORIS AND AWAIT FURTHER ORDERS. BAZA OUT.
ANTON TO BORIS, WE'RE IN POSITION AND HEADING TO MORTON FROM THE WEST. WE'LL SEE YOU IN THE VILLAGE. OVER.
BORIS TO ANTON, ENGAGING ENEMY AT THE LIGHTHOUSE THEN CONTINUING ON TO MORTON FROM THE EAST. GOOD LUCK. OUT.
